text: Nocardioides conyzicola is a Gram-positive, non-spore-forming, rod-shaped and non-motile bacterium from the genus of Nocardioides.UniProt == References == ==External links== *Type strain of Nocardioides conyzicola at BacDive - the Bacterial Diversity Metadatabase conyzicola Category:Bacteria described in 2013
title: Nocardioides conyzicola
